skill.name: clinical-reports
skill.description: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (radiology/pathology/lab), clinical trial reports (ICH-E3, SAE, CSR), and patient documentation (SOAP, H&P, discharge summaries). Full support with templates, regulatory compliance (HIPAA, FDA, ICH-GCP), and validation tools.
skill.summary: Write comprehensive clinical reports including case reports (CARE guidelines), diagnostic reports (r...
skill.author: K-Dense-AI

security_audit.summary: All 560 static analysis findings are false positives. The skill contains no actual security vulnerabilities - it uses no cryptographic algorithms, executes no shell commands, and has no network operations. The tools are legitimate clinical documentation utilities that help ensure HIPAA compliance and proper medical reporting.

content.user_title: Write compliant clinical reports with validation
content.value_statement: Clinical reports require strict compliance with regulatory standards and medical accuracy. This skill provides validated templates, automated compliance checking, and regulatory guidance for all types of clinical documentation.
actual_capabilities: Generate case reports following CARE guidelines with automated validation
Create diagnostic reports for radiology, pathology, and laboratory results
Write clinical trial documentation including SAE reports and CSRs per ICH-E3
Validate HIPAA compliance and de-identification of patient data
Produce patient documentation including SOAP notes, H&P, and discharge summaries
limitations: Requires medical knowledge input - cannot generate clinical data
Templates must be customized with actual patient information
Final medical accuracy review by qualified professionals required
Cannot interpret medical images or diagnostic data

use_cases.title: Publish case reports following CARE guidelines
use_cases.description: Write comprehensive case reports for journal submission with automated CARE compliance validation and de-identification checking.

use_cases.title: Generate regulatory-compliant trial reports
use_cases.description: Create serious adverse event reports within 24 hours and clinical study reports following ICH-E3 structure for FDA submission.

use_cases.title: Document patient encounters professionally
use_cases.description: Generate structured SOAP notes, discharge summaries, and consultation notes that meet billing and legal documentation standards.

prompt_templates.title: Basic case report
prompt_templates.scenario: Writing a simple case report for journal submission
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me write a case report about a 45-year-old patient with a rare drug reaction. Include CARE guidelines structure and ensure HIPAA compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Diagnostic report template
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating a radiology report from imaging findings
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a structured radiology report for a chest CT showing bilateral ground-glass opacities. Include technique, findings, and impression sections.

prompt_templates.title: Clinical trial SAE report
prompt_templates.scenario: Reporting a serious adverse event in a clinical trial
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an SAE report for a patient who developed severe neutropenia after 14 days of study drug. Include causality assessment and regulatory timeline.

prompt_templates.title: Comprehensive validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this clinical report for HIPAA violations, check CARE guideline compliance, validate medical terminology, and ensure all regulatory requirements are met.

output_examples.input: Help me write a case report about a patient with drug-induced liver injury from amoxicillin-clavulanate
output: Title: Drug-Induced Liver Injury from Amoxicillin-Clavulanate: A Case Report
Abstract: 42-year-old woman developed hepatocellular injury after 10 days of amoxicillin-clavulanate...
Introduction: Drug-induced liver injury (DILI) is a significant cause of acute liver failure...
Patient Information: A 42-year-old woman presented with jaundice and fatigue...
Timeline: Day 0 - Started amoxicillin-clavulanate; Day 10 - Developed symptoms; Day 15 - Hospital admission...
Discussion: This case demonstrates classic features of amoxicillin-clavulanate hepatotoxicity...

best_practices: Always validate HIPAA de-identification before sharing any patient information
Use the validation scripts to ensure compliance with reporting guidelines before submission
Include visual elements like timelines and flowcharts for complex cases
anti_patterns: Never include identifiable patient information without proper de-identification
Do not skip regulatory compliance checks for clinical trial documentation
Avoid using unvalidated medical terminology or non-standard abbreviations

faq.question: Do I need medical expertise to use this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill helps structure and validate clinical reports but requires your medical knowledge to provide accurate clinical information.

faq.question: How does the HIPAA compliance checking work?
faq.answer: The skill scans your text for 18 types of identifiers (names, dates, SSNs, etc.) and flags potential privacy violations that need de-identification.

faq.question: Can this skill interpret medical images or lab results?
faq.answer: No, you must provide the clinical findings and interpretations. The skill helps document them in proper format.

faq.question: What regulatory guidelines does it support?
faq.answer: CARE guidelines for case reports, ICH-E3 for clinical study reports, FDA regulations for trials, and HIPAA for patient privacy.

faq.question: How long does it take to generate reports?
faq.answer: Most reports can be generated in minutes, but SAE reports must be completed within regulatory timelines (7-15 days depending on severity).

faq.question: Can I customize the templates for my institution?
faq.answer: Yes, the templates serve as starting points. You can modify them to match your institutional requirements and preferences.
